reporter_caption.center: IN RE SOLID GOLD v. CITY AND COUNTY, HONOLULU, 25230 (Haw. 1-31-2003)

caption.center: IN THE MATTER OF SOLID GOLD, INC., DBA GOLDEN DOLLS SHOWGIRLS,
Respondent-Appellant-Appellee, v. CITY AND COUNTY OF HONOLULU, AND COUNTY

opinion.posture: APPEAL FROM CIRCUIT COURT OF THE FIRST CIRCUIT (Civ. No. 01-1-3156)
opinion.attorneys: David Z. Arakawa and Debi S. Tulang-De Silva for complainants-appellees-appellants on the notice.
opinion.panel: MOON, C.J., LEVINSON, NAKAYAMA, ACOBA, JJ., and CIRCUIT JUDGE KOCHI, ASSIGNED BY REASON OF VACANCY
opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER APPROVING WITHDRAWAL AND DISMISSAL OF APPEAL Upon consideration of Appellants City and County of Honolulu and the City and County of Honolulu Liquor Commission's notice of withdrawal of appeal, the papers in support, and the records and files herein, it appears that the parties have reached a settlement on the issues raised in this appeal, and the City agreed to withdraw its appeal. Therefore,
IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the notice of withdrawal of appeal is approved, and this appeal is dismissed pursuant to HRAP Rule 42(b).
